name: Whitepink Concoction
description: A white potion with pink bubbles. It rattles on the table as if about to set into a gallop.

name: Eight Eye Potion
description: A black potion filled with eight newt eyes. A dark smoke rises from the surface.

name: Groundboiler Brew
description: A rough brown potion that rumbles in place. Bits bubble over and drip off the side.

name: Growing Potion
description: A dark green potion in which bits of saturated dirt float. The wood around it is sprouting leaves.

name: Lovely White Draught
description: +ACI-A frosty white+AC0-blue potion. Small slivers of ice float around inside

name: Hissing Bowl
description: A shallow stone bowl filled with grey liquid. Bits of mandrake are yowling inside.

name: Latticed Mixture
description: An orange mixture. White mesh boils from the surface. It almost looks like cotton candy.

name: Jingling Philter
description: A festive green+AC0-and+AC0-red mixture. It jingles like a bell when moved from side to side.

name: Sticky Elixir
description: A purple potion that is so thick that it almost won+IBk-t come out of the bottle.

name: Shining Jar
description: A jar filled with light blue liquid that shines with a soft light. The seed inside is taking root.

name: Seeking Tonic
description: A ghostly red potion. Shapes inside move like predators waiting to be released.

name: Burning Dedoction
description: A spotted beige potion that resembles nothing less than an egg in potion bottle form. It burns to touch.

name: Lovely Red Draught
description: +ACI-A hot burgundy potion. Small burnt slivers float inside

name: Lovely Black Draught
description: A soft black potion. Bits of ice and burnt thorns drift around inside. They dance around each other.

name: Bounteous Bouquet Potion
description: A transparent potion. Rose petals of all three colors are encased inside.
